title.narrative: Strengthening Social Protection and Inclusion System

description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to provide economic support to poor households affected by the COVID-19 pandemic and improve the income generation capacity of the poor and vulnerable

condition.narrative: Manuals for MIDEs Production Inclusion Programs (LA, Schedule 2, Section I.E.4). "Prior to the carrying out of any MIDEs AssetsTransfer Production Inclusion Programs under Part 3.1 of the Project, the Borrower shall furnish to the Bank a separate manual forsaid Part of the Project (MIDEss Assets Transfer Production Inclusion Program Manual), satisfactory to the Bank"

Safeguards | (LA, Schedule 2, Section I.G.1 and G.2. “The Borrower shall carry out the Project in accordance with the IPPF and theEMP and ensure that the terms of reference for any consultancies related to technical assistance provided under the Project, shallbe acceptable to the Bank."
